/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
